description: Asparagus officinalis 'Purple Passion' is an amazing plant species to grow in your garden due to its hardy and versatile nature. It's highly tolerant of various climates and soils, and enjoys partial to full sunlight. Plus, it is incredibly easy to care for- requiring minimal attention, and is low-maintenance in its watering and pruning requirements. One of its best features, however, is its stunning purple color, which brings a touch of uniqueness to any garden or landscape. For these reasons and more, Asparagus officinalis 'Purple Passion' is a great choice for a lush and vibrant accent in your garden.
